JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you thrive in a diverse role working both with Workday Finance Applications as well as supporting the finance teams in the use of these? Would you enjoy interacting with a large variety of colleagues and influencing journey of the continuous adoption of Workday Finance Applications?  

Stibo Systems is seeking a new team member to join the Global Finance Team. This position will report into Senior VP of Finance and is based out of our HQ in Aarhus, Denmark.

The job:
Your primary focus will be on the continuous support, maintenance and development of our Workday Financial Applications and integrated solutions to ensure we as a Finance Team can meet reporting deadlines and ever-changing business requirements.

Furthermore, you will:

  • Create and maintain finance related custom reports and dashboards in Workday and Adaptive.
  • Gathering business and security requirements, and together with external consultant’s design, configure, test and document the implemented solutions.
  • During the bi-yearly Workday release cycle, you will be responsible for identifying Finance related items in Workday Release Notes and review and test impact of these together with the Finance Team and other teams within Stibo Systems.
     

You will also support our Finance Team during internal and external audits, ensuring data integrity and timeliness.

The team
You will be working with the other members of our Finance Team as well as having a strong partnership with the other Workday HCM and PSA Specialists and reporting specialists within Stibo Systems. The Finance team is around 20 people with a good mix in gender and age.

“We are a small, close knit team of professionals that work together towards common goals using Workday as our primary tool for financial reporting…” says Hiring Manager Kathrine Ravn Stougaard, Senior VP, Finance.


Who we are searching for:
As a person you are motivated by exploring new ideas and will master new areas quickly by balancing the need for both “big picture”-thinking as well as respecting the necessary level of attention to detail. You have a positive and proactive mindset when it comes to challenges paired with good problem-solving skills.

Futhermore, you have:

  • Several years of experience working in a similar role
  • Proven knowledge and experience with Workday Finance modules (Financials, Accounts, Project Billing, Projects, Expenses, Customer Contracts) and Workday Adaptive Planning
  • A analytical mindset with a high level of attention to detail, interested in working closely with stakeholders across the organization
  • English and Danish language skills – writing and speaking
  • Workday Financial Training or Certification is a plus
     

You do not need to tick of all the boxes, but we are looking for an experienced profile. Training courses may be provided.

We offer
At Stibo System, we offer more than just a job. We put people first and inspire you to become the best version of yourself.

  • We care about our colleague’s work-life balance and we offer flexibility through a hybrid work model
  • International: A growing global company, worldwide career opportunities, and multicultural teams
  • Well-being: A caring and inspiring environment, promoting a happy and healthy lifestyle through a wide range of facilities and activities

 

This is who we are
Stibo Systems is a global company with a Nordic heritage. We help companies transform into digital leaders through market-leading multidomain master data management that delivers transparency. Through our solution, large brands (our customers) connect data across their products, customers, stores, employees, suppliers, digital assets and much, much more.

We have been around for a while but still have that scale-up feel, even with offices across the globe – from Atlanta to Tokyo. Our people are key to our success and together we continue to create a diverse, unique and exciting work environment.

Interested?
We invite candidates for interviews on a continuous basis, so please apply as soon as possible.

Should you have questions about the position, you are also welcome to contact Kathrine Ravn Stougaard, Senior VP, Finance, on krst@stibosystems.com.

We look forward to hearing from you.
